owun me sandaha awashya mudal ras karanne punyadhara ha thaman athin nima wu athkam bhanda yanadiya wikuna labana aadayameni.ema sangamaya wisin arambaimata adahas kara gena sitina thawath punya kriyawak wanuye shrawyabadhitha lamayin sandaha daham pasalak arambaimayi.buddhagama gana thawath wi.si.di. thati eli dakwimath, shrawyabadhitha mapiyange samanya daruwanta sangnya bhashawa uganwa owun katha pariwarthakawarun lesa yoda ganimath thawath wadapiliwelaki.shrawyabadhitha janathawata jangama durakathanawalin labagatha haki ekama sahanaya wanne paniwida likhitha kramayen kiyawa dana ganima bawin, me sangamaya, malayasiyawe widuli sandesha saha bahu madhya amathyanshaya samanga 2001 di athi karagath ekangathawata anuwa me shrawyabadhitha prajawata durakathana gasthuwalin nidahaswimata idakada labini.anagathayedi shrawyabadhitha ayage em.em. es. paniwida sandaha wattamak laba ganimatath malayasiyanu shrawyabadhitha aya athara sangnya bhashawen sanniwedana katayuthu kirima sandaha durakathanaya yoda ganimata awasara laba ganimatath adahas kere.
